DOC.brief_summary: This study endeavor examine relationship acupuncture , anxiety , performance test work memory . In study , participant complete State-Trait Anxiety Inventory ( STAI ) survey determine anxious moment anxious tend general . Then ½ subject receive acupuncture 20 minute ½ rest quietly 20 minute . After period , subject complete STAI survey . Then subject complete Automated Operations Span Task ( AOSPAN ) computerize test work memory . Statistical analysis perform determine acupuncture effect State-level anxiety performance AOSPAN .
DOC.brief_title: The Effect Acupuncture Anxiety Working Memory
